comment.author: 85353320@N02
comment._content: This is the Albatros C.IV prototype, not a C.III. The C.IV used a C.III fuselage and a new wing cellule to test the wing design for the Albatros G.II bomber. Notice the interplant struts are different than the C.III.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
